extends Object
implements Injection

      • setupListener

        public void setupListener(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext bundleContext,
                 ProviderAdapter providerAdapter)
        Description copied from interface: Injection
        Will set up an OSGi listener for the injected service, so that it will be injected when the service appears in OSGi and retracted when the service disappears from OSGi.
        Specified by:
        setupListener in interface Injection
        Parameters:
        bundleContext - the object to register the listener with
        providerAdapter - the object to notify after an injection has been received and set
